archimate:DataObject.name: ServiceSpecificationType
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The ServiceSpecificationType class defines a generic category of ServiceSpecifications. Each ServiceSpecificationType serves to group a set of particular ServiceSpecifications that share some of the same behavior and other semantics. One result of this is to be able to more efficiently define a set of related Services that can be grouped together to form a higher-level Service. For example; a given higher-level Service might include VPN and QoS Services. If these Services are always used together; then they can be categorized using a common type.
